title: JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When I click on the 'Finish' button to create a JAR file, I receive an error message saying 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5.
OB: When creating a JAR file, an error message is displayed indicating that the JAR creation has failed due to unsaved editors.
EB: When creating a JAR file, all open files should be saved before the JAR packager starts the creation process. If any unsaved files exist, a prompt should be displayed to save them before proceeding with the JAR creation.
SR:
1. Open multiple files in the editor. 
2. Start the JAR packager. 
3. Click on the 'Finish' button. 
4. Verify that a prompt is displayed to save unsaved files before proceeding with the JAR creation.
